nodes.documentation:
@title Arbitrable Deposit
 This is a a contract which allow for an owner deposit. Anyone besides the owner can seek arbitration/file a claim as a claimant.
To develop a contract inheriting from this one, you need to:
 - Redefine RULING_OPTIONS to explain the consequences of the possible rulings.
 - Redefine executeRuling while still calling super.executeRuling to implement the results of the arbitration.
nodes.name: ArbitrableDeposit

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Can only be called by the owner."

arguments.value: Can only be called by the owner.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Can only be called by the owner."

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Cannot be called by the owner."

arguments.value: Cannot be called by the owner.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Cannot be called by the owner."

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Can only be called by the claimant."

arguments.value: Can only be called by the claimant.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Can only be called by the claimant."

nodes.documentation:
@dev Indicate that a party has to pay a fee or would otherwise be considered as loosing.
 @param _party The party who has to pay.
nodes.name: HasToPayFee

nodes.documentation: @dev Owner deposit to contract. To be called when the owner makes a deposit.
nodes.name: deposit

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Cannot claim more than what is deposited."

arguments.value: Cannot claim more than what is deposited.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Cannot claim more than what is deposited."

nodes.documentation:
@dev File a claim against owner. To be called when someone makes a claim.
 @param _claimAmount The proposed claim amount by the claimant.
nodes.name: makeClaim

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The response amount has to be less than the claim deposit amount."

arguments.value: The response amount has to be less than the claim deposit amount.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The response amount has to be less than the claim deposit amount."

nodes.name: claimResponse

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Owner fee must equal arbitration cost."

arguments.value: Owner fee must equal arbitration cost.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Owner fee must equal arbitration cost."

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "A dispute has already been raised."

arguments.value: A dispute has already been raised.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "A dispute has already been raised."

nodes.name: payArbitrationFeeByOwner

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Claimant fee must equal arbitration cost."

arguments.value: Claimant fee must equal arbitration cost.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Claimant fee must equal arbitration cost."

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "A dispute has already been raised."

arguments.value: A dispute has already been raised.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "A dispute has already been raised."

nodes.documentation:
@dev Pay the arbitration fee to raise a dispute. To be called by the claimant. UNTRUSTED.
 Note that this function mirror payArbitrationFeeByOwner.
nodes.name: payArbitrationFeeByClaimant

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) returns (function (uint256,bytes memory) payable external returns (uint256))

nodes.documentation:
@dev Create a dispute. UNTRUSTED.
 @param _arbitrationCost Amount to pay the arbitrator.
nodes.name: raiseDispute

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The contract is not waiting for the claimant."

arguments.value: The contract is not waiting for the claimant.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The contract is not waiting for the claimant."

arguments.value: Not enough time has passed.

nodes.documentation: @dev Reimburse owner if claimant fails to pay the fee.
nodes.name: timeOutByOwner

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The contract is not waiting for the owner."

arguments.value: The contract is not waiting for the owner.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The contract is not waiting for the owner."

arguments.value: Not enough time has passed.

nodes.documentation: @dev Pay claimant if owner fails to pay the fee.
nodes.name: timeOutByClaimant

arguments.value: Wrong dispute ID.
Invalid ruling.
